xml.title: Summary
xml.body:
All statistics are based on differences between model daily means and observations. Detailed result and description of this product are also available from the Arctic MFC.

Results are provided for three domains. Maps and region descriptions are available from web pages at the arctic centre, the three domains that are relevant for this product are Atlantic sector, Nordic Seas, and Barents Sea

Statistics are based on data from the MODIS instrument, which is retrieved from the MyOcean product OCEANCOLOUR-GLO-CHL-L3-NRT-OBSERVATIONS-009-032. This product has a resolution of 1/24 degree in longitude and latitude.

Note that at these high latitudes, there will be no or very few observations during winter (October-March), due to a low solar elevation angle (or polar night conditions). Presently, no observations of chlorophyll, ocean color or nutrients are assimilated for this model product.
